function.name: get_gdd_response
function.description: Retrieve Growing Degree Days (GDD) based on specified parameters from a specified service.

base.description: The base temperature (in Â°F) used for the GDD calculation.

placebox.description: Identifier for the place or region for the GDD calculation.

areabox.description: Area code associated with the place for regional differentiation.

date.description: Date or date range for which GDD should be calculated.

plap.description: Location parameter for the calculation, possibly a specific station or site identifier.
